txt.en:
'The text you recovered told of an alliance between Angmar and Saruman. I have investigated the matter and found that the White Hand has sent an emissary to treat with Angmar.

'As a result, there have been many reports of Orcs gathering near the tower of Minas Caul near Barad Gúlaran. We must stop this alliance from happening, no matter the cost.

'Defeat the emissary, the half-orc Bâlak, and return back to me when the deed is done. You will want to take allies if you are to succeed!'

'You have helped the Free Peoples avoid the greatest of threats in the North! An alliance of this magnitude would certainly have spelled the downfall of Eriador.\n\n'Thank you for helping us push back evil this day.'
'You must defeat Bâlak and keep the White Hand from allying itself with the Iron Crown.'
Having intercepted a pledge from Saruman of Isengard, you must enter Minas Caul and defeat his emissary to stop an alliance between the Iron Crown and the White Hand.
Enter Minas Caul and defeat Bâlak.
Minas Caul is one of the large towers of Barad Gúlaran, south of Gath Forthnír.\n\nYou must travel to Barad Gúlaran and issue a challenge to Bâlak, the emissary of the White-hand, inside Minas Caul.
Brúnfair is at Gath Forthnír, north of Barad Gúlaran.\n\nHaving defeated Bâlak, you should return to Gath Forthnír and tell Brúnfair that you have accomplished the deed.
